DOC.brief_summary: Effects two depression medication sexual functioning
DOC.detailed_description: A Twelve-week , Multi-center , Randomized , Double-blind , Double-dummy , Parallel-group , Active control , Escalating Dose Study Compare Effects Sexual Functioning Bupropion Hydrochloride Extended-release ( WELLBUTRIN XL , 150-450 mg/day ) Extended-release Venlafaxine ( EFFEXOR XR , 75-225 mg/day ) Subjects Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Primary diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) must meet DSMIV criterion current major depressive episode least 8 week long 2 year . HAMD17 total score > 17 screen baseline . Severity illness score > 4 screen baseline . Willing discuss sexual functioning investigator designee . Sexual activity lead orgasm least every 2 week . Past current DSMIV diagnosis Bipolar Disorder I II , schizophrenia another psychotic disorder ( ) . Primary DSMIV diagnosis receive treatment Panic Disorder , Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Post Stress Disorder within previous 12 month . Poses homicidal serious suicidal risk , make attempt within month prior screen ever homicidal . Myocardial infarction 1 year screening . Taken ibupropion hydrochloride venlafaxine last 6 month . Positive urine test illicit drug use alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month . Psychotherapy within 3 month . Pregnant . Electroconvulsive therapy transcranial magnetic stimulation within 6 month prior screen . ECG clinical evidence atrial ventricular hypertrophy .
